patthana8.56:1.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto nasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.56:1.1_1: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.56:1.1_2: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto nasaṅkilesiko ca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.56:2.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ naasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.56:3.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikañca kilesavippayuttaṁ naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kilesavippayutto naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
